db:abstract.db:para: The Custom3DLabel type is for creating custom labels to be added to a graph.
This type was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.1.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type is for creating custom labels to be added to a graph. You can set text, font, position, scaling, rotation, and colors. You can also toggle borders and background for the label. Colors, borders and background are used from active theme unless any of them is set explicitly.

db:note.db:para: In scaling, z has no effect. Setting the same x and y retains the original font dimensions.

db:section.db:title: backgroundColor : color
db:section.db:para: Color for the label background, if enabled. Defaults to "gray".

db:section.db:title: backgroundEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enable label background. If set to false, backgroundColor has no effect. Defaults to true.

db:section.db:title: borderEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enable label borders. Defaults to true.

db:section.db:title: facingCamera : bool
db:section.db:para: Forces the label to face camera always. Defaults to false. If set to true, rotation() has no effect.

db:section.db:title: font : font
db:section.db:para: The font to be used for the label. Defaults to Font {family: "Arial"; pointSize: 20}. Special formatting (for example outlined) is not supported.

db:section.db:title: text : string
db:section.db:para: The text for the label. Rich text is not supported.

db:section.db:title: textColor : color
db:section.db:para: Color for the label text. Also affects label border, if enabled. Defaults to "white".
